name: TwinklePop-Crush Puzzle Game
description:
Classic gameplay, reappearance!

Click the adjacent squares of the same color to eliminate them all! The higher the number of eliminations each time, the higher the score. Break the record and watch combos!
Easily click, refresh and eliminate, the best effects, play the four seasons!

Provide three props for you to use.

Blasting-Directional elimination, where to eliminate and revitalize the whole situation!
Color change-magic props, color change, meticulous layout, maximize score!

Remember to share the good game with your friends, I wish you a happy game ~
